conbody.p: When you execute a test containing loadVars and endLoadVars commands, the following process will take place, with i starting with 1 and ending with the number of rows in the data file:

ol.li: The ith row of the data file will be fetched.
The values of the row will be mapped to the variables used in the test case.
The steps between loadVars and endLoadVars will be executed using these mapped values.
